Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at 89th/Commercial
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 89th, Houston, 87th and Commercial due to, street blockage near 89th/Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Commercial, 89th, Houston, 87th and Commercial due to, street blockage near 89th/Commercial.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near State/Monroe
ShortDescription: SB 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Wacker, Clark, Jackson and State due to, street blockage near State/Monroe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Wacker, Clark, Jackson and State due to, street blockage near State/Monroe.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
